DOC.brief_summary: This 3-arm pilot randomize control trial evaluate effectiveness two novel way structure financial incentive motivate sustain long-term weight loss . The study recruit eligible employee Children 's Hospital Philadelphia ( CHOP ) participate 6-month weight loss program additional 3-month follow-up period . The primary outcome measure randomize control trial pound weight lose baseline 6 month . The goal study evaluate whether novel financial incentive program deliver workplace effectively encourage sustained weight loss among obese employee . The study hypotheses 1 ) mean weight loss great intervention group compare control group end 24-week intervention period ; 2 ) individual intervention group low mean weight end 12-week follow-up period individual control group .
